long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Securely collaborate with other users by sharing your desktop within NextPlane nCore Business Collaboration Service.

nCore is a cloud-based real-time communications and collaboration service that allows users to exchange instant messages, engage in group chats, make voice or video calls, and share files and desktopsâ€”with users on nCore as well as colleagues on Microsoft, Cisco, IBM, Broadsoft UC platforms and services.

For more information checkout www.ncore.io.
